New Records: Georgia earned its first-ever point at a major tournament in a 1-1 draw with the Czech Republic at Euro 2024.
Key Match Events: Georgia scored an opener via a penalty after a handball decision by Czech defender Robin Hranec.
The Czech Republic equalized with a header that rebounded off the post and a chested goal by Patrik Schick.
Georgia had a missed opportunity in stoppage time by Saba Lobjanidze on a counterattack.
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams almost certainly require a win in their last group games to qualify for the knockout stages.
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia's missed chance by Saba Lobjanidze could have changed the result.
The draw means both teams need a win in their last group games.
